author: Adam Wells
title: Cameraman Who Filmed Inside Jazz Locker Room Diagnosed with COVID-19, in a Coma
description: A cameraman who filmed inside the  Utah Jazz  locker room after a March 7 game against the  Detroit Pistons  is in a coma after being diagnosed with the coronavirus...
content:
Jeenah Moon/Getty Images
A cameraman who filmed inside the Utah Jazz locker room after a March 7 game against the Detroit Pistons is in a coma after being diagnosed with the coronavirus.
